title: looking for a support main to go bot duo, bronze/silver
body: add OverSimp if you are interested, voice (discord, skype) available

replies.body:
I'm a Bronze V Sona main, if you want to play a match or two.

Plz duo with me I want to get out of Bronze V...
Hey mate I also main sona im s3 steadily climbing add me and I. And maybe help you with your build, runes and masteries, I also play lulu and nano heaps if you need advice with them :)

> [{quoted}](name=Glori0us,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=ux2bTzjd,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-19T01:08:43.482+0000)
>
> I'm a Bronze V Sona main, if you want to play a match or two.
> 
> Plz duo with me I want to get out of Bronze V...

As a support player, I would recommend you try a more meta support.. You should try Janna, Zyra, Braum or Tahm kench. Those are all good supports that can contribute much more to winning a game than Sona, and they are easy.

i think sona is good
she has good damge and good heals just imagine the movement speed with quinn!
